lazyPreloading.hint: Set browser (e.g. Chrome, Edge) network to Fast or Slow 3G to see the effect
lazyPreloading.hint2: Panel2 is simply loaded by React.lazy witch will show a full page Suspense loading page (Has page flash effect)
lazyPreloading.hint3: Panel3 is loaded by lazyWithPreload (No page flash effect) and withProcessIndicator for indicating loading state

sequentialProcessing.hint: Click '$t(action.run)' to start process simulation by running random timeout processes
